testcase.name: Crear

failure.message:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Don't know how to encode { "name": "morpheus", "job": "leader" } as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("{"mimeType":"application/json","charset":"UTF-8"}", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
